timeline.bodyText:
The comment here probably needs to account for the role of SANITIZED_PATHS. Specifically, something like

If the path has been successfully sanitized before in the lifetime of this JVM, return.
If the path exists, checks that it is a directory.
If the path exists and is a directory, remove all sub-folders whose names are the string representation of an UUID.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
